data.name: Metal Suits
data.detailed_description:
This is a side-scrolling action game in which Kevin, the last hope of mankind, appears as the main character.

The game is set in the distant future the Helios System(like Solar System) inhabited by various planets and races. A few years ago, one-eyed aliens(Golida species) invaded the Helios system and occupied all planets.

Metal Suits is a pixel-art-based action game. You will become aware of your gaming skills and reflexes. You can get different types of metal suits in the game that offer different weapons and special attacks.

Beat 'em up all the Golida species that have taken over the planet! And you will find Golida King and you have to kill him.

data.short_description: Take metal suits and beat 'em up all the aliens!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
